<title level="1" right="Trait">[Unbounded](/Traits.aspx?ID=720)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 172 <sup>2.0</sup>

Unbounded planes loop back on themselves when a creature reaches the plane’s “edge.”
name: Unbounded
